lost-foods-desc: These are previously earned foods that were lost by death.
food-cat-desc: Every kind of food, classified by its item or block code.
pie-category-cat-desc: Different types of perfectly cooked pies, classified by their names.
meal-category-cat-desc: Cooked meals, classified by their recipe category: meaty stew, vegetable stew, soup, porridge, jam, and scrambled eggs
expandedfoods-meal-desc: Cooked meals, classified by their recipe category: meaty stew, vegetable stew, soup, porridge, jam, and scrambled eggs. The Expanded Foods meals are also included [wiki] [handbook]: augratin, compote, salad, cold pasta, hot pasta, pilaf, and yogurt.
shawarma-perfect-cat-desc: Every kind of shawarma wrapper, each with any delicious filling.
hardtack-bake-cat-desc: As easy as bread, but with a longer shelf life. [wiki] [handbook]
sushi-cat-desc: Japanese food made from seaweed, rice, and optionally fish nuggets or veggies. [wiki] [handbook]
fried-cat-desc: Prepared and breaded, then fried to perfection. [wiki] [handbook]
deluxe-cat-desc: Fried foods drizzled with various sauces and syrups. [wiki] [handbook]
vegetablejuice-cat-desc: Every kind of vegetable juice. They can be drunk from any potable container.
tea-cat-desc: Every kind of tea. They can be drunk from any potable container.
floralzones-fruit-cat-desc: Collect and eat the fruits from all around the global.
floralzones-vegetable-cat-desc: Collect and eat the vegetables from all around the global.
wildcraftfruit-fruit-cat-desc: Collect and eat the Wildcraft fruits from all around the global.
wildcraftfruit-nut-cat-desc: Collect and eat the WildCraft nuts from all around the global.
climate-spanning-cat-desc: A few select foods that require ingredients from both hot and cold climates.
mushroom-cat-desc: Every kind of mushroom that can be foraged.
juice-cat-desc: Every kind of fruit juice. They can be drunk from any potable container.
cider-cat-desc: Alcoholic drinks made from the first level of fermentation: ciders and meads
expandedfoods-alcohol-desc: Every type of alcoholic drink, including: fine wine, strong wine, cider, brandy, aged brandy, vintage brandy, vodka, and aqua vitae.
cookedfish-cat-desc: Every kind of grilled fish from primitive survival.
poison-cat-desc: Foods that remove health points when eaten.
